title: Strategies for Enhancing Nursing Students' Sense of Belonging: Approaches in Blended Learning Environments

context.prior_knowledge: Basic nursing theory and experience in online/in-person learning
context.additional_context: Project-based assessment course analyzing quantitative/qualitative data via mixed-methods research, exploring belongingness issues during post-pandemic transition to face-to-face learning

learning_goals: Learners can identify and explain at least three factors that hinder a sense of belonging in blended learning environments.
Learners can propose strategies to improve interaction with peers/instructors, enhancing a sense of belonging by at least 20%.
Learners develop and present a prototype of a sense-of-belonging enhancement program as a project outcome.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
